title: Support Windows authentication
body: Supporting Windows Authentication could be very usefull for example writing app that interacts with Microsoft Dynamics CRM

comments.body: Device portal and APIs are much more useful at enterprise with windows authentication is supported. How secure it is without ADS integration?
have ability to pass authentication to ADFS on premise. currently it is only support or Azure, Facebook but there are a lot of company can not or do not want to use Azure AD

Totally agree! This is really necessary, especially on Enterprise environments where the most standarized authentication for Microsoft server products (like SharePoint, CRM or AX) is Windows Authentication.
Please Support this from the API.
